Box plot wrapper for categorical covariates

Source: R/fns_gg.R
ggbox.Rd

Create box plots for a chosen variable by all discrete covariates. Numeric variables will be dropped, except the chosen variable to plot.

Usage

ggbox(d, var, cats, ...)

Arguments

d

<dfr> A data frame.

var

<var> A variable to plot as unquoted name.

cats

<var> Optional. Categorical variables to plot as a vector of unquoted names.

...

Additional arguments for ggplot2::geom_boxplot.

Value

A ggplot object of a box plot.

Examples

d <- mtcars |> dplyr::mutate(cyl=factor(cyl),gear=factor(gear),vs=factor(vs))
d |> ggbox(mpg)
#> Dropped: cyl vs gear

d |> ggbox(mpg,c(cyl,vs))
#> Dropped: cyl vs
